sentence: A midget psychic escaped from jail. the call went out that there was a small medium at large.
explanation: In this joke, medium refers to the psychics profession and size.
first_new_sentence: The restaurant serves a medium-sized pizza that is perfect for two.
second_new_sentence: A medium is used to facilitate communication with spirits or the deceased.

sentence: Why did frosty the snowman want a divorce? because he thought his wife was a flake.
explanation: Flake refers to both a snow flake and a flaky person.
first_new_sentence: The snow on the ground is made up of various sized flakes, making it very soft.
second_new_sentence: She always bails on plans, so I think she can be a bit of a flake.

sentence: In the two serious sentences for each word, Ive included one for each meaning of the word as required.
